# Noções básicas de R


## Objetos



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
a <- 1

a + 1
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] 2
```
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
a <- c(1,2,3)

a + 1
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] 2 3 4
```
:::
:::

Texto


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
a <- "Bom dia"

paste(a, 'Joana')
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] "Bom dia Joana"
```
:::
:::
